body: The girl of the first story, what an idiot. Typical stupid hentai woman. Her desensitized body that couldn't be satisfied with normal sex is just a broken slutty body. I'm surprised the man still wanted that loose cunt. He managed to withstand his broken heart, but at what cost? The girl he met in the mixer, she thought he had fucked her because he liked her. What a poor girl. Just think about how she would react when she know that he returns to his old girlfriend just after he fucked her. Maybe his love for his senpai is bigger than we expected. He was also managed to stay gentle with the senpai. The senpai is so lucky, ahe better be grateful to have such a kind boyfriend that won't abandon her after seeing how slutty she became.
ddamn that dude handle NTR like a champ bro
